mapper.select: SELECT budget_party_seq FROM party_budget GROUP BY budget_party_seq HAVING budget_party_seq = #{budgetPartySeq}
SELECT budget_seq FROM party_budget GROUP BY budget_seq HAVING budget_seq = #{budgetSeq}
SELECT plan_seq FROM plan_master GROUP BY plan_seq HAVING plan_seq = #{planSeq}
SELECT plan_party_seq FROM plan_master GROUP BY plan_party_seq HAVING plan_party_seq = #{planPartySeq}
